anya-e0105n33:1_0: Aparāpi tisso aṭṭhakathāyo santi khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathā dhammapadaṭṭhakathā suttanipātaṭṭhakathā cāti, yā tāsu dissamānanigamanavasena ācariyabuddhaghoseneva katāti paññāyanti.
anya-e0105n33:1_1: Tattha pana vuttavacanāni kānici kānici āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttākārena na honti.
anya-e0105n33:1_3: Ekacce pana ‘‘ācariyassa upathambhakattherehi paṭhamaṁ katā, pacchā ācariyena osānasodhanavasena pariyosāpitā vā bhaveyyuṁ, abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṁ āyācantena cūḷabuddhaghosena vā katā bhaveyyu’’nti vadanti.
anya-e0105n33:2_0: Taṁ tathā vā hotu aññathā vā, idāni ekantato vinicchinituṁ na sukarameva.
anya-e0105n33:2_2: Tāsu hi dhammapadaṭṭhakathaṁ kumārakassapattherena āyācito sirikūṭassa (sirikuḍḍassa) rañño pāsāde viharanto paramparābhataṁ sīhaḷabhāsāya saṇṭhitaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathaṁ pāḷibhāsāya āropetvā vitthāragatañca vacanakkamaṁ samāsetvā gāthāsu asaṁvaṇṇitapadabyañjanāni saṁvaṇṇetvā akāsi.
anya-e0105n33:9_0: Gāthānaṁ byañjanapadaṁ, yaṁ tattha na vibhāvitaṁ;
anya-e0105n33:10_0: Kevalaṁ taṁ vibhāvetvā, sesaṁ tameva atthato.
anya-e0105n33:14_0: Pāsāde sirikūṭassa, rañño viharatā mayā’’ti dha. pa. aṭṭha. 2.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n33:15_0: Ettha ca sirikūṭo nāma samantapāsādikānigamane siripāloti vutto mahānāmoyeva rājāti vadanti.
anya-e0105n33:15_1: Evaṁ sati mahesiyā ānayanaṁ samādāpanamārabbha tena raññā dinne dhūmarakkhapabbatavihāre vasantena sā katāti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṁ mahāvaṁse –
anya-e0105n33:22_0: Tassa pana rañño kāle sā niṭṭhāpitāti na sakkā gahetuṁ.
anya-e0105n33:22_1: Tassa hi rañño ekavīsatimavasse samantapāsādikaṁ niṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0105n33:22_3: Etthantare sādhikaekavassena ‘‘catasso ca āgamaṭṭhakathāyo tisso ca abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo ayañca dhammapadaṭṭhakathā’’ti sabbā etā na sakkā niṭṭhāpetunti.
